price: او موږ نه پوهيږو چې آيا د ځمكې اوسېدونكو ته د بدۍ اراده شوې او كه رب يې سمه لار ورښوول غواړي.
arabic: وَأَنَّا لَا نَدۡرِيٓ أَشَرٌّ أُرِيدَ بِمَن فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ أَمۡ أَرَادَ بِهِمۡ رَبُّهُمۡ رَشَدٗا

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: wa-annā lā nadrī asharrun urīda biman fī al-arḍi am arāda bihim rabbuhum rashadan
